mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.app_flag , t1.email , t1.tel , t1.log_level , t1.manage_name , t1.KEY_WORD from sys_app_manage_contact_way t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update sys_app_manage_contact_way t1 set t1.app_flag =#{dto.appFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.email =#{dto.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.tel =#{dto.tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.log_level =#{dto.logLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.manage_name =#{dto.manageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.KEY_WORD =#{dto.keyWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where t1.id = #{dto.id}
mapper.delete: delete from sys_app_manage_contact_way t1 where t1.ID in (${ids} )
mapper.update: delete from sys_app_manage_contact_way t1 where t1.id in( ${ids})
